original_title: 実録!! ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 11
overview: The 11th installment of the series that contains the horror posted videos sent by viewers. "Raven" where a stranger entered the video that captured the game corner of a business hotel, "Blood-painted hut" that captured a child murdered in a hut on the outskirts of the town, and all the horrifying images of the world Contains 10 segments.
title: Actual Record!! Posted video of the real horror 11
